name: Right to Confirm and Access
description: Right to confirm whether a controller is processing the consumer's personal data and to access such data.

name: Right to Correct
description: Right to correct inaccuracies in the consumer's personal data, taking into account the nature of the personal data and the purposes of the processing.

name: Right to Delete
description: Right to delete personal data provided by or obtained about the consumer.

name: Right to Data Portability
description: Right to obtain a copy of personal data in a portable and, to the extent technically feasible, readily usable format.

name: Right to Opt Out
description: Right to opt out of the processing of personal data for purposes of targeted advertising, the sale of personal data, or profiling in furtherance of decisions that produce legal or similarly significant effects.
